sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng héshí yīxià zhèxiē shùjù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez vérifier ces données.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please verify this data.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège guāndiǎn fǎn le chángshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce point de vue va à l'encontre du bon sens.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This viewpoint goes against common sense.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizimen xǐhuan kàn dònghuàpiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants aiment regarder des dessins animés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children like watching cartoons.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 两国之间的关系很紧密。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liǎng guó zhījiān de guānxi hěn jǐnmì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les relations entre les deux pays sont très étroites.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The relationship between the two countries is very close.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā liǎn shàng de biǎoqíng hěn yánsù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'expression sur son visage est très sérieuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The expression on his face is very serious.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ zhuōzi yí dào chuāng biān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez déplacer la table près de la fenêtre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please move the table to the window.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen zài bǐsài zhōng bài le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils ont perdu le match.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They lost the match.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dàibiǎo gōngsī cānjiā huìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il représente l'entreprise à la réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He represents the company at the meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū fēnwéi sān gè bùfen.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre est divisé en trois parties.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book is divided into three parts.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì gōngsī de zhǔxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est le président de l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is the chairman of the company.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他是我最好的朋友之一。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì wǒ zuìhǎo de péngyou zhīyī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est l'un de mes meilleurs amis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is one of my best friends.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì hái méiyǒu dìng xiàlái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette affaire n'a pas encore été décidée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This matter hasn't been decided yet.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen liǎng jiā zhǐ gé yī dǔ qiáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nos deux maisons ne sont séparées que par un mur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our two houses are only separated by a wall.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng guānbì diànyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez éteindre l'alimentation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn off the power.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lù shàng dǔchē le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un embouteillage sur la route.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There's a traffic jam on the road.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我已经去过北京多次了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng qùguo Běijīng duōcì le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis déjà allé à Pékin plusieurs fois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have been to Beijing many times.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wàimiàn tài chǎo le, wǒ shuìbuzháo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est trop bruyant dehors, je ne peux pas dormir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's too noisy outside, I can't sleep.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège wǎngzhàn hěn yǒuyòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce site web est très utile.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This website is very useful.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这样做可以省很多时间。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèyàng zuò kěyǐ shěng hěn duō shíjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Faire ainsi peut faire gagner beaucoup de temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Doing it this way can save a lot of time.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qìwēn míngtiān huì xiàjiàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La température baissera demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The temperature will drop tomorrow.
